meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unfriendly or aloof.
meanings.sent1: Her offishnesses made it hard to approach her at the party.
meanings.sent2: His offishnesses at work often made his colleagues feel unwelcome.
meanings.sent3: Despite her offishnesses, she secretly enjoyed the company of her friends.
meanings.sent4: The offishnesses of the cat gave it an air of mystery and independence.
meanings.sent5: The offishnesses of the old man were like a shield protecting his vulnerable heart.

meanings.definition: Behaviors or attitudes that are distant or reserved.
meanings.sent1: The offishnesses of the new student made it hard for others to get to know him.
meanings.sent2: She displayed offishnesses towards strangers as a way to protect herself.
meanings.sent3: His offishnesses were like a cloak he wore to keep people at arm's length.
meanings.sent4: The offishnesses of the mountain range made it seem unapproachable and majestic.
meanings.sent5: The offishnesses of the closed-off shopkeeper made customers hesitant to ask for help.
